flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Using a prebuilt glider and kite. You will install a small spy camera into the underside of the glider attached to the transmitter and battery which have been installed within the glider. The release
guide.introduction_rendered: Using a prebuilt glider and kite. You will install a small spy camera into the underside of the glider attached to the transmitter and battery which have been installed within the glider. The release
guide.summary: A parafoil kite with a support bar and solenoid release mechanism will lift a small glider, fitted with a real time video camera, into the air to a desire height.
guide.title: Kite That Launches a Glider
